product_name: Thule Pack 'n Pedal Tour Bike Rack
long_description: Designed for commutes and bike tours, the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Tour Rack works on both the rear stays and front fork, and features innovative attachment for compatible accessories (sold separately). Patented rack attachment system works on virtually any bicycle from full suspension mountain bikes to commuters and everything in between. Patented attachment system secures easily to any type of frame material. Tough construction allows for variety of rugged riding uses. Silent and vibration-free performance. Works best with Thule Panniers (sold separately), but can work with any type of pannier with the addition of the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Side Frames (sold separately.
short_description: Designed for commutes and bike tours, the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Tour Rack works on both the rear stays and front fork, and features innovative attachment for compatible accessories (sold separately).
